choose_origin.description: If specified, this will override the title that shows up when choosing an origin in the layer.
choose_origin.markdownDescription: If specified, this will override the title that shows up when choosing an origin in the layer.

view_origin.description: If specified, this will override the title that shows up when viewing an origin in the layer.
view_origin.markdownDescription: If specified, this will override the title that shows up when viewing an origin in the layer.
